meanings.definition: The act of distributing or the state of being distributed.
meanings.sent1: The distributorship of flyers was completed by the team.
meanings.sent2: The distributorship of food to the homeless was a heartwarming gesture.
meanings.sent3: The distributorship of hugs among friends brought smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a distributorship of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The distributorship of sunlight through the trees created a beautiful pattern on the ground.

meanings.definition: A person or company that distributes goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The distributorship ensured timely delivery of the products.
meanings.sent2: The distributorship expanded its reach to new markets.
meanings.sent3: The distributorship accidentally delivered packages to the wrong address.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a distributorship of positivity to everyone he met.
meanings.sent5: The distributorship of knowledge through books opened up new worlds for the students.
